website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and adjustable option that comes in multiple color options.
pros: Reinforced tactical belt adjusts from a 30-inch to a 48-inch waist
Multiple pouches and holders including 3 magazine pouches, 2 internal document pouches and 1 pistol holster
cons: Larger customers commented that this vest is too small for a bigger person

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty bad ass
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty bad ass. Im 240 and 6'0. I have everything to the largest size and it barly fits. But overall pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed description
customer_reviews.text: Over all great quality, I'm using it for tournament shooting. Really Heavy duty, I removed the hand gun carry and added a military pouch instead because velcro was kinda weak for my heavy pistol. The vest fits very good and is comfortable and flexible. I'm 240 and 6 foot, and there all adjustment straps to help vest hug body. However if your short or really skinny it may fit very loose.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Low price, superior quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised by the quality of this product due to its low price. I was more than pleasantly surprised when it arrived. Great quality. Easy to set up. Great belt. Can hold an additional thigh drop holster. Lots of pockets, gray Velcro and zippers! I love the thing!
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy for that
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, well made and functional for the money. It lists as air-soft? Pretty sturdy for that. I am using it as a tactical vest..... I have it fully loaded with rifle and pistol mags, holds well and is adjustable and comfortable. Is more than adequate for a quick get out situation. con is pistol holster a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Small. Holster not workable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge guy. I have kind of a line-backer build. This thing is tight on me, even with all the slack taken out. It'll be tough wearing it over winter clothes. I would not use the holster. It simply is not secure enough. It has velcro and once lanyard that is in difficult position to cinch. You could lose a good pistol if you carry it in this thing. Lot's of great features, though. Plenty of room for all kinds of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Byung-chul Harris

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for paintball but also seems to work for tactical needs too
customer_reviews.text: I want a tactical harness to carry gear if situation ever arises for the need. This seems to fit the bill for my 5'10" 200 lbs frame. I was able to get 3 magpul 30 round 556 mags in the front pockets and 5 total pistol mags easily in additional front pockets. Several pocket options for skinny flash lights and velcro adjustments all over to get the perfect fit. Velcro for applying badges too ("security" or "police"). Belt secures nicely and I can even run another side holster off it. This setup is exactly what I've been after at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: For getting seriously geared up.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly designed tactical vest that has compartments for just about everything a person could need in combat or camping. It would also work great for fishing and it's just convenient in general to hold many important items. It is very durable and strong so everything fits securely. This thing is amazingly versatile and feels really comfortable to wear. It's fine to wear in between other garments.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great vest but things to know
customer_reviews.text: So this is more on the "China" side if you know what im saying. The zipper did break like 3-4 little things, but it still zips up if you are careful. The vest itself is lightweight, but with gear, it can get heavy quick. I don't have many complaints, and it does hold my 1911 pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Snowboarder

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got the vest really quick. Actually sooner than it said it would arrive.took it out the package and tried it on, had to be adjusted be was pretty comfortable. When I zipped it up the very first time the zipper broke and could not get it off. Finally got it off and fixed the zipper . Very disappointed with that but other than that the vest is exactly what I was looking for. And a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this wore this vest about 3 times, mostly for checking the fit. I like that is light weight and comfortable but the zipper has started coming a part which makes it useless since the chest area stays open. With the pouches loaded the upper vest just flops around. The other thing that I have problems with is the holster is secured with velcro so if you use the holster with anything that has weight, it constantly pulls away from the vest. It does have 2 straps to help secure the holster on one side and the top but those only keep it from falling off the vest completely.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Not for big guys
customer_reviews.text: I came back to drop the star review. Contacted support, and all they cared about was the measurement. No offer of a refund or exchange. Stay away from this.. I bought this hoping for a decent range vest. I'm a big guy, 6'4 and 270. Even with the sides extended out, still way too small. Vest looks to be of decent quality, just smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shempert

customer_reviews.title: THE ZIPPER IN THE FRONT WILL BREAK. W/O ANYTHING IN  THE VEST.
customer_reviews.text: Second day I had it simply just broke the zipper didn't even want to work properly when I first got it I had to fight with the zipper to even get it to go into the slot to zip up. At first I was very satisfied with the product until I wanted to put it on a zip it up. Former military and I can tell you right now it s***. I will be returning it. And most likely will not be purchasing another vest from barbarians. Very unhappy and very unsatisfied customer pretty much I'm pissed. Not only did I have to return the jacket that I had ordered on here
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Short

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile. Durability? Not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I use this when doing home inspections so I can carry a lot of my gadgets on me while having the hydration bladder handy for those 120+ degree attics. It is very versatile, and I can carry almost all of my gadgets with me. However, one of the chest pockets on the right side ripped out completely on the bottom after about 7 uses. So, I got to use it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: mmohn01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very durable .....perfect for military PD and Tactical. A lot of compartments and plenty of storage for mags.... easily adjustable size for body armor vest residing underneath. Would like to see a snap for the weapon holster up front for quicker draw other than that the vest is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A2 Maintenance & Repair

customer_reviews.title: Best vest ever
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, all my other vests broke because they were flimsy on the airsoft field, this one is perfect because the belt is connected to the vest, my last belt would fall off because its not attached and i would have to grab my belt and put it back on in the middle of a fire fight in the airsoft game, this best is amazing plus the velcro patch on the back i can finally put my russian spetsnaz patch on to complete my loadout. BEST. VEST. EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Would get a better review if they size was what they posted. I have a 52in chest. This isnt close you need to be under 45in to zip it up
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps gear organized
customer_reviews.text: High quality and durable with easy zippers and pockets to store all my gear. Was able to adjust the vest to fit perfectly and have all my gear in hands reach. The mollee lets you add about any gear you can think of. I would buy it again and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jknc

customer_reviews.title: Brakes Easily
customer_reviews.text: This a cheap vest. I wish I never bought it. The zippers broke the second time I used it. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cashell Southwick

customer_reviews.title: Good to have to protect your chest area and carry things
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy tactical vest that is comfortable to wear ad does a nice job of having places to carry extra things for your adventures. It also can help protect your chest again some projectiles. Good for the air soft or paint ball enthusiast in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for playing airsoft with his friends! He had another vest but he’s outgrown it and this one is much better because it’s sturdier and has more pockets. This is adjustable so it can grow with him too. I’m very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Hoggan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this crap is made for a little kid or a woman. Don't waste your time if you're a grown man.
customer_reviews.author: thomas p rogers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money I paid
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the money. The belt and mag pouches alone were worth the $30 I paid for the entire vest. Extremely lightweight and fairly durable. The material and zipper appear very solid and made of quality material. The AR15 pouches are a little tight but should stretch with use. The cross-draw holster is well made but doesn’t sit very tight against the vest. Other than that particular issue, I can’t complain. After making the necessary adjustments for my body size, which were fairly easy, I was more than satisfied. Worth the money paid for sure which is why it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner70

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper. Sent it back next day.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper failed the third time I zipped it up. Plastic tip that engages the zipper pull separated from the backing. Very poor quality zipper. Did not have it long enough to make any use of it.
customer_reviews.author: mwjaco

customer_reviews.title: My female body guard loves it! She XL. Not for 300 pound man.
customer_reviews.text: I totally dislike the item. It’s to small for me and I wear 3XL. It fits my Body Guard and she wears XL. The item said it would fit 3XL, that’s a lie. I need one that’s fits 58 inch Chest and 48 inch waist...
customer_reviews.author: Henry R Alford

customer_reviews.title: Quite the nice product
customer_reviews.text: I mostly got this for cosmetic / photographic purposes so I don't get a lot of actual "use" out of it persé. I'm above average tall so it fits a tad snug but its not like "too small" or anything, but just smaller than I thought when i read "adjustable" Very great product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: TMDJCBeatz

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're a child or female
customer_reviews.text: First the likes: color is what I expected, versatile, and the construction appears to be very well done The dislikes: Very small. Would not fit my 6' 1", 215 frame, with any room for adjustment for anything other than a t-shirt worn underneath. Zipper pull is on the left which indicates construction for females, mag pouches are tiny. Returning mine. Might be suitable for small frame adults or children. But no amount of training will suit any guy's muscle memory as we are used to the zipper pull on the right on all our garments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You buy cheap you get junk
customer_reviews.text: The holster must be for a compact an not a full size auto,they however do not state that plus after trying to make it fit the holster tore down the side thus making it useless
customer_reviews.author: americanorway

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Update Wore this for the second time and the bottom of the zipper separated and broke immediately fortunately it was still eligible for a replacement we will see how the new one holds up when I get it on Monday Original Great for the price only downsides are the zippers on mine and my friends are hard to get started and the fact that there is no molle on the front means you are stuck with the load out it comes with as all the pouches attach with Velcro but for the price it is definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Ready for antifa
customer_reviews.text: Can wait for antifa to come, so I can try this out
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Zipper does not work
customer_reviews.text: The product as a whole is good. Doesn't feel cheaply made. The only problem I have is the zipper will not stay zipped. Once you zip it up, the bottom of the zipper starts to come undone all the way up the vest. Kinda annoying
customer_reviews.author: MIKE P

customer_reviews.title: High Quality! Pockets for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Made well, tough material. Easy to adjust for a perfect fit! I love the pocket layout. Binoculars, rifle mags, pistol mags, back up weapon holster, extended mag pouch left side, coms pocket, and sevral more. Fits great! Very comfortable loaded up running, crouching or leaning. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nervous but satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it feels cheap and that scares me... But, I've used it a handful of times now and I'm pretty rough on it. It's great for airsoft, plenty of pushes and space for everything. I throw a water bladder in the inside back pouch. That back pouch has a velcro strip at the top which is struggly, but the other two inner pouches zip closed and are great. I can throw my keys and phone on there during a game with no concern. I personally like getting my sidearm off my thigh so the holster is nice, but not great for a fast draw.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Krieger

customer_reviews.title: No Way!
customer_reviews.text: This vest runs extremely small. I’m a 2X guy. It fit like a large. I would need a 5X in the vest. There would be no way for me to get the size right when selecting this vest, without trying it on before buying.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my husband for his birthday\fathers day and he absolutely loves it and has it fully loaded and ready to go has so many different spaces and is very nice fitting as well as it contours to the body well after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wick

customer_reviews.title: Broken zippers
customer_reviews.text: This vest came with a broken zipper which cannot be repaired. It's very cheaply made and quality is absent. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kidlat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great value here. A G22 fits perfectly, and the mags fit perfectly in the pouches. Also the larger pouches fit Pmags perfectly. My only complaint is the left handed zipper. Also no idea on durability yet. Great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Name Goes Here

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: The sizing was way off. Everything looks good and seems solid but is very small in size, and that's after expanding everything out . I'm not a real big guy so this blew my mind how small it was.
customer_reviews.author: David and Jessica Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper quality.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper didn’t last one year of occasional moderate use. Nice vest other than the zipper. It was an issue from the get go but not bad enough to return. Now it’s totally useless. Recommend trying to find something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Baer

customer_reviews.title: Child sized
customer_reviews.text: This was small almost child sized compared to a diffrent brand I order from Amazon as well. This particular vest better fit my wife at 4' 11" then it did me at 6'. So if you are on the shorter side this shouldn't be a problem but if you are a taller gent then you might wanna look at some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Bf loves it
customer_reviews.text: My bf requested this for his birthday. Although he haven’t used it outside yet, he said the material doesn’t feel cheap at all and you wouldn’t think it’s less than $40. Definitely recommend it if you are in a budget or just don’t want to spend a lot of money
customer_reviews.author: Mcmluver

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and made with very strong material. Great for hunting. Easily adjustable size.
customer_reviews.author: Onur Arca

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: i put it on zipped it up and it all came apart. Terrible quality. this isnt worth a dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Fits the way it should. . lots of versatility. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Justine Bowden

customer_reviews.title: I look like I am wearing a kids vest
customer_reviews.text: The vest itself is ok for the price, but if you are a larger man, its not for you, I'd say if your over 180 pounds and 5'11", forget it! I look like I am wearing a kids vest. Not the manufacturer's fault though, I guess this is a common problem with vest's of this type so I am reading? I would have tried to return it but I altered it too try and compensate, but its just not working. If your a small man, you will be ok! Also if your wanting a duty belt, this vest already has one on it!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Great Tac Vest
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail today. So far, I'm impressed! It's made from good sturdy material and fits nicely. One thing I do dislike is where the holster is located as I am left-handed and there doesn't seem to be any way to make it work for that but that's just a lefty's world for you. Other than that, I'm satisfied and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Hammon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it says
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit as described. I’m 6’ with a 40” waist and a fat belly. With all straps fully released, it BARELY fits around me. I’ll be returning it. I’m sure it is a fantastic vest for guys who are in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Filori

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a little short for my long torso. Im 6'2" and it rides a little high but only I would notice it. Build quality is higher than the price on the tag. Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable practical and comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for Halloween and will be using for airsoft as well. He loves it! It's adjustable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: For the price is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a tactical type vest before but I do like this one. It seems to be made of good quality. It can take a minute to get it adjusted right but fits nice, I'm 6'4 185. I'd recommend
customer_reviews.author: jason sadler

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: First time I zipped it up, several teeth fell off the zipper. I returned it. The UTG is much better made and only a few $ more.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Fischer

customer_reviews.title: ok if you're looking for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fits Size medium shirt and 32" waist max. Everything is velcro so it's super noisy
customer_reviews.author: Malleablesun

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, although there is a LOT of velcro everywhere. Kind of noisy. Holds everything I need and more, field test pending. *Update* Very happy with purchase. Holds a lot of weight, extremely convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mt.Plant91

customer_reviews.title: Great for the range or hunting very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I love it exactly what I wanted. Going to order another one for sure !
customer_reviews.author: Dannie blair

customer_reviews.title: This is badass.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I am 6 foot 3 inches and weigh around 230 and I just needed to adjust it and it felt great. It fits my 2 pistols mags and 4 M4 magazine my Hi-Capps 5.1 fits in the pistol pouch. I use the best pouches for speed loaders. And the pouch at the top right (if looking at the vest or top left in having the vest on) I hold my radio for my friends. This is an amazing product and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Best Vest on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think you can find a better shooting vest and I know you can’t find a better one at this orice
customer_reviews.author: attyjimg

customer_reviews.title: Great for airsoft and shooting !
customer_reviews.text: Great quality vest. Only downside if any is that the amount you can adjust the height is pretty limited imo. Makes for a tight fit though which I actually appreciate. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and easy tot adjust. My kind of product!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack26

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my husband for his birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for his birthday. Everything that he needs for hunting (or just hiking) has a place in the vest
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Groth

customer_reviews.title: More a toy than a useful item
customer_reviews.text: Very light material, zipper is very difficult to start right out of the box, more a toy than a useful item.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Erb

customer_reviews.title: Great for call of duty costume
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son as part of a Halloween costume, he likes it and says it fits
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great vest just to throw on and go. Good for the price. Zipper seemed cheap, but other than that no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest, not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The Vvest started falling apart after only a few uses, it does not the strongest stitching. Maybe I got a defective item? I was hoping it would be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Sizing isn’t correct.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for youth vest. This was one of the choices. It’s huge on my 9 year old to the point of not being able to even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! So nice I almost didn't want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! So nice I almost didn't want to use it for paintball lol! Love all the pockets and storage this has! The big pocket on the right is big enough to fit an iPhone 8+ and the other pockets were great for paintball pods and mini air tank cartridges. I would recommend this to anyone in paintball or airsoft!! Awesome vest!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our airsoft outings
customer_reviews.text: Fits 14yo son with minor adjustments of straps. Perfect for our airsoft outings!!
customer_reviews.author: M.V.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very well made product. Adjustable size, modular design, solid stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Bergles

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, a little small but I'm 6' 200 lbs, so I wasn't expecting the best fit. All in all, best thing for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Redwolf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend purchased this for his Bane costume for Halloween... worked perfectly. He loved it and was able to size it to his perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Not a paint baller. I thought ity would be a nice shooting vest and hunting. I was right, excellent quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Green Beret 91B2S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing great for bb games for my husband and lasts
customer_reviews.author: Mirelys Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, fulfills expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I have played several matches with this product and was not surprised or disappointed, it is lightweight and agile when bare, but once you add gear it can be loud, over all I would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Corben Havener

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Daphine J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Takes some adjusting and then change up readjust, and then....perfect 👍👊
customer_reviews.author: E. & M. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Tore on first use
customer_reviews.text: My son wore it for 2 hours and when he took it off, the seem next to the zipper tore. Would have expected it to last for more than one wear
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This tactical vest really surprised me. It fit me just fine. The vest is very well made and will not wear out easily. It is strong enough to hold anything I need. For the price and the durability of this, I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Benson Arvel

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a really good price.
customer_reviews.text: Likes everything.place for flash light pistol knife magazines rifle and pistol shot gun shells phone and much more.everything in one place. Great for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Needs slight improvement but will do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Not bad mesh feels like it might rip over time with rough use. The holster sags out from the top with anything of substantial size i.e.: double stack mags of 12 or more but does hold well with single stack like glock 43, shield. Not the best not the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great price and assembly
customer_reviews.text: Best of all is that it fits now that I am a big guy
customer_reviews.author: LUIS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Greater coverage. Purchased for paintball and it will serve the purpose great!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice, perfect for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: Great airsoft vest, a bit too heavy for what it is, but useful and at the right price. Has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: EdCoolio

customer_reviews.title: tatic cool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vest for my weeken scrimmish in the area. Holds my nerf or airport ammo well. Very light and tactic cool
customer_reviews.author: Lan N.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the money , a little heavy , but thats expected
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This was better then expected! Very sturdy and light weight, bought this for my husband. Easy to adjust size and distributes weight well. Feels solid, good materials used. The gun holster, mag pouch, bullet holder are enough for use.
customer_reviews.author: Talley Collier

customer_reviews.title: Well made item but did not fit
customer_reviews.text: The product description says it will fit up to a certain size, but I found that to not be the case. It runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. The size is something big for children
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The size is something big for children. It's a bit heavy, it could be lighter, that's why it's 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: KDOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I wish the pockets were bigger but they do hold alot of things
customer_reviews.author: Rod Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I'm in the miltary and it is everything I need and then some!
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: great sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: great sturdy product. i wish there was a way to adjust the shoulders as the bottom strap is around my hips not my waist
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Buchannan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vest for my son. After wearing it for only an hour, he unzipped it and the zipper pieces started breaking off. The zipper is very cheap and he now can’t use it at all. Cheaply made, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K Harris

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loved it. Small was a little big, but still worked great for his Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: j pixton

customer_reviews.title: Messed up zipper
customer_reviews.text: So far it nice. The zipper was a little messed up I couldnt get it to work, there was like extra stitching around it and it wouldn't work. I just burnt what i can with a lighter and now it works.
customer_reviews.author: Peace love killuminate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Well made, well stitched. My son is 17 and uses it for airsoft, and all the guys loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Plastic zipper, but good vest
customer_reviews.text: Got well and serves it’s purpose but a couple teeth on the zipper came off on only the second use. It still works and I still use it but gotta be gentle on the zipper is all.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very well made for a vest that is not the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. It feels like good material, fits heavy, and and looks realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest but its not made for a big person also zipper is reversed on the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Mr burns

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro is kinda crappy and fits awkwardly. There’s much better best out there
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest
customer_reviews.text: Very cell made and fit great! Plenty of pockets for anything you need to carry. Everything also stayed very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice Quality Inn great fit I would recommend it again
customer_reviews.author: Walter Akers

customer_reviews.title: Good vest
customer_reviews.text: Got for my son to play airsoft. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it..great quality vest for men and women works well for me at the shooting range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Barbarians Tactical Molle Vest Military Airsoft Paintball Vest Assault Swat Vest Adjustable Lightweight
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :12.76 x 12.44 x 4.57 inches; 2.98 Pounds
 * Date First Available :May 22, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Barbarians
 * ASIN :B071P6MLCX

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #19,093 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #19 inTactical Vests 
    *  #2734 inHunting Equipment 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars564 ratings
feature_bullets: SIZE ADJUSTABLE - ITEM SIZE: 23 x 21 inches. The MAXIMUM WAIST is 48 inch, the SMALLEST WAIST is 35inch. The LONGEST LENGTH is 24 inch, the SHORTEST LENGTH is 21 inch. Shoulders and reinforced belt on vest can be adjusted with long velcro strips. ATTENTION to the information of size before ordering.

HIGH QUALITY - Barbarians Tactical MOLLE Vest is made from durable, comfortable high-density 600D Polyester, large strong zippers and mesh, our Barbarians Tactical MOLLE Vest is tough and great for CS game, airsoft, paintball, combat and battles.

ORGANIZED - Our vest has 3 rifle magazine pouches, 3 small equipment pouches, 1 pistol holster, 1 flashlight pouch, 1 interphone pouch, 1 accessory pouch, 1 removable bullet holder, 1 phone pouch, 1 interior mesh pocket for hydration bag and 2 internal document pouches.
ADDITIONAL ATTACHMENT - Rear MOLLE panel is constructed with modular webbing for attaching additional camouflage gear material and pouches. 2 D-rings help you hold carabineers or other equipments.
SKIDPROOF - Antiskid inside the panel helps you fix the rifle easily even the panel on the right shoulder is wide.
